name: The Lost Apple
description:
Hey! I seem to be lost!? Where am I? Why do I feel like the forest is looking at me? I just want to get back to my tree!

Oh! There is my leaf! Me and him, we are joined together forever. 

Hey, look! It's following your curser! 

Move around like in a normal platformer!

WASD or The Arrow Keys!

Jump with either W or Space!

Click your screen to grapple to your leaf!

Collect the Golden Leaves to move on to the next level!

Thank you for helping me! Try and get me back as fast as you can! Leave your best times down in the comments, and I will see you around! Try not to eat many apple after playing this game.
